description: The lanes at Birmingham Airport are opened following months of major delays for passengers in 2024.
title: Birmingham Airport unveils new screening lanes to curb queues
title_page: Birmingham Airport unveils new screening lanes to curb queues - BBC News
maintext:
An airport that was plagued with "unacceptable queuing" last summer has introduced passenger screening lanes to curb the problem.
Birmingham Airport has invested Â£5m to help ensure long lines do not "impact customers' summer again".
The lanes are responsible for screening cabin luggage and have the capacity to screen up to 3,600 passengers per hour during peak times.
